You're STILL doing it! You're just parroting the official debunking of Climategate without actually looking at what those emails said. "Hide the decline" - remember that phrase? They literally talked about hiding data that didn't fit their narrative! And those "independent" investigations were conducted by the same institutions that benefit from climate funding. Total whitewash!

And now you're trying to gaslight me about the Medieval Warm Period being "regional"? That's complete revisionist history! There's archaeological evidence of Viking settlements in Greenland, wine growing in England - this was a global phenomenon that they've tried to erase from the record because it destroys their "unprecedented warming" claim.

You keep saying "basic physics" like that settles it, but you're ignoring the fact that CO2 is a trace gas - 0.04% of the atmosphere! Water vapor is a much more powerful greenhouse gas, but they don't talk about that because they can't tax it.

And your point about governments just taxing fossil fuels directly? Are you kidding? They ARE doing that! Carbon taxes, emissions trading, green subsidies - it's the biggest wealth transfer in human history! They needed the climate scare to justify it.

I'm done trying to educate you. You're either completely brainwashed or you're part of the system. Either way, you're helping to destroy our economy and freedom based on a lie. History will judge people like you who enabled this massive fraud. The truth will come out eventually, and you'll have to live with the fact that you were on the wrong side.

<END>
